title: Building a Website with AI: What I Learned
excerpt: I spent this weekend building a website with AI, ticking off my first 2025 goal. Not because I needed to, but because I was curious. I'd been meaning to start blogging for a while, and this seemed like the perfect test case. Having dabbled in HTML and CSS years ago in university, I wasn't starting completely blind. But I was rusty enough that this felt like a genuine test of current AI capabilities.
